mapper.select: SELECT ID, TITLE, MODEL, DESCRIPTION, PRICE, INSERT_TIME, CATEGORY, DISCOUNT, PERCENT, SALE_YN, NAME, TYPE, DATA FROM TB_PRODUCT WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, TT.* FROM TB_PRODUCT TT WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND ROWNUM <= (#{page} + 1) * #{size}) WHERE R > #{page} * #{size}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_PRODUCT WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND TITLE LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_PRODUCT WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND CATEGORY = #{catId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_PRODUCT WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND SALE_YN = #{saleYn}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, TT.* FROM (SELECT * FROM TB_PRODUCT WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY INSERT_TIME DESC) TT ) WHERE R <= 8
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM TB_PRODUCT ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM()) WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND ROWNUM <= 4

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, A.* FROM ( SELECT L.*, P.* FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_ID, COUNT(USER_ID) AS COUNT FROM TB_LIKE GROUP BY PRODUCT_ID) L, TB_PRODUCT P WHERE L.PRODUCT_ID = P.ID ORDER BY COUNT DESC) A) WHERE R <= #{rowNum}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM TB_PRODUCT ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM()) WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND ROWNUM <= 5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PRODUCT ( ID, CATEGORY, TITLE, MODEL, DESCRIPTION, PRICE, DISCOUNT, PERCENT, SALE_YN, INSERT_TIME, TYPE, DATA ) VALUES ( SQ_PRODUCT.NEXTVAL, #{category}, #{title}, #{model}, #{description}, #{price}, #{discount}, #{percent}, #{saleYn}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 9 / 24, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{type}, #{data} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_PRODUCT SET DELETE_YN = 'Y' ,DELETE_TIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 9 / 24, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') WHERE ID = #{id}

UPDATE TB_PRODUCT SET CATEGORY = #{category}, TITLE = #{title}, MODEL = #{model}, DESCRIPTION = #{description}, PRICE = #{price}, DISCOUNT = #{discount}, PERCENT = #{percent}, SALE_YN = #{saleYn}, UPDATE_TIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 9 / 24, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') WHERE ID = #{id}
UPDATE TB_PRODUCT SET DELETE_YN = 'Y', DELETE_TIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 9 / 24, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
